summary: Set in The Netherlands at the end of WW II, this touching story, told in flashbacks, explores the complex and romantic relationship between an adult soldier and a displaced, lonely adolescent boy.
cast: Maarten Smit|Jeroen Krabbé|Andrew Kelley|Freark Smink|Elsje de Wijn|Derk-Jan Kroon|Wiendelt Hooijer|Iris Misset|Gineke de Jager|Tatum Dagelet|Marie-José Kouwenhoven|Valerie Valentine|William Sutton|Andrew Butling|Andrew Cassani|Moniek Kramer|Antoinette van Belle|Rients Gratama|Gees Linnebank|Steffen van der Kolk|Bonnie Doets|Cathelijne Lussen|Loes Muizeveld|Kathelijne van der Zwaan|Yuri Huyg|Marcel Vogelaar
title: Por un soldado perdido
